Hell that was great, one thing I never heard of anybody calling him chuck, but I don't know what his friends called him back in the day!  Great catch Margaret

EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com wrote:          
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

File : /Margaret Downey/Radio Sweep - Manual/ChuckClarke.mp3 
Uploaded by : itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...> 
Description : Used manual sweep of Duracell KP028 radio. Got Rees's great uncle saying, "CHUCK CLARKE" after I asked if he could say his name. Raw clip. No alterations of timing. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Margaret%20Downey/Radio%20Sweep%20-%20Manual/ChuckClarke.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...>
